name: Real.exp_arsinh
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.exp (Real.arsinh x)) (HAdd.hAdd x (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt)
decl:
theorem exp_arsinh (x : ‚Ñù) : exp (arsinh x) = x + ‚àö(1 + x ^ 2) := by
  apply exp_log
  rw [‚Üê neg_lt_iff_pos_add']
  apply lt_sqrt_of_sq_lt
  simp

name: Real.arsinh_zero
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arsinh 0) 0
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_zero : arsinh 0 = 0 := by simp [arsinh]

name: Real.arsinh_neg
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arsinh (Neg.neg x)) (Neg.neg (Real.arsinh x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_neg (x : ‚Ñù) : arsinh (-x) = -arsinh x := by
  rw [‚Üê exp_eq_exp, exp_arsinh, exp_neg, exp_arsinh]
  apply eq_inv_of_mul_eq_one_left
  rw [neg_sq, neg_add_eq_sub, add_comm x, mul_comm, ‚Üê sq_sub_sq, sq_sqrt, add_sub_cancel_right]
  exact add_nonneg zero_le_one (sq_nonneg _)

name: Real.sinh_arsinh
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.sinh (Real.arsinh x)) x
decl:
/-- `arsinh` is the right inverse of `sinh`. -/
@[simp]
theorem sinh_arsinh (x : ‚Ñù) : sinh (arsinh x) = x := by
  rw [sinh_eq, ‚Üê arsinh_neg, exp_arsinh, exp_arsinh, neg_sq]; field_simp

name: Real.cosh_arsinh
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.cosh (Real.arsinh x)) (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cosh_arsinh (x : ‚Ñù) : cosh (arsinh x) = ‚àö(1 + x ^ 2) := by
  rw [‚Üê sqrt_sq (cosh_pos _).le, cosh_sq', sinh_arsinh]

name: Real.sinh_surjective
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Function.Surjective Real.sinh
decl:
/-- `sinh` is surjective, `‚àÄ b, ‚àÉ a, sinh a = b`. In this case, we use `a = arsinh b`. -/
theorem sinh_surjective : Surjective sinh :=
  LeftInverse.surjective sinh_arsinh

name: Real.sinh_bijective
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Function.Bijective Real.sinh
decl:
/-- `sinh` is bijective, both injective and surjective. -/
theorem sinh_bijective : Bijective sinh :=
  ‚ü®sinh_injective, sinh_surjective‚ü©

name: Real.arsinh_sinh
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.arsinh (Real.sinh x)) x
decl:
/-- `arsinh` is the left inverse of `sinh`. -/
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_sinh (x : ‚Ñù) : arsinh (sinh x) = x :=
  rightInverse_of_injective_of_leftInverse sinh_injective sinh_arsinh x

name: Real.sinhEquiv_symm_apply
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.sinhEquiv.symm x) (Real.arsinh x)
decl:
/-- `Real.sinh` as an `Equiv`. -/
@[simps]
def sinhEquiv : ‚Ñù ‚âÉ ‚Ñù where
  toFun := sinh
  invFun := arsinh
  left_inv := arsinh_sinh
  right_inv := sinh_arsinh

name: Real.sinhEquiv_apply
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (Real.sinhEquiv x) (Real.sinh x)
decl:
/-- `Real.sinh` as an `Equiv`. -/
@[simps]
def sinhEquiv : ‚Ñù ‚âÉ ‚Ñù where
  toFun := sinh
  invFun := arsinh
  left_inv := arsinh_sinh
  right_inv := sinh_arsinh

name: Real.sinhOrderIso_symm_apply
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (‚áë(RelIso.symm Real.sinhOrderIso)) Real.arsinh
decl:
/-- `Real.sinh` as an `OrderIso`. -/
@[simps! (config := .asFn)]
def sinhOrderIso : ‚Ñù ‚âÉo ‚Ñù where
  toEquiv := sinhEquiv
  map_rel_iff' := @sinh_le_sinh

name: Real.sinhOrderIso_apply
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (‚áëReal.sinhOrderIso) Real.sinh

  map_rel_iff' := @sinh_le_sinh

name: Real.sinhHomeomorph_symm_apply
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (‚áëReal.sinhHomeomorph.symm) Real.arsinh
decl:
/-- `Real.sinh` as a `Homeomorph`. -/
@[simps! (config := .asFn)]
def sinhHomeomorph : ‚Ñù ‚âÉ‚Çú ‚Ñù :=
  sinhOrderIso.toHomeomorph

name: Real.sinhHomeomorph_apply
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Eq (‚áëReal.sinhHomeomorph) Real.sinh

initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (Real.arsinh x) (Real.arsinh y)) (Eq x y)
decl:

theorem arsinh_inj : arsinh x = arsinh y ‚Üî x = y :=
  arsinh_injective.eq_iff

initialProofState:

name: Real.arsinh_eq_zero_iff
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq (Real.arsinh x) 0) (Eq x 0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_eq_zero_iff : arsinh x = 0 ‚Üî x = 0 :=
  arsinh_injective.eq_iff' arsinh_zero

name: Real.arsinh_nonneg_iff
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le 0 (Real.arsinh x)) (LE.le 0 x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_nonneg_iff : 0 ‚â§ arsinh x ‚Üî 0 ‚â§ x := by rw [‚Üê sinh_le_sinh, sinh_zero, sinh_arsinh]

name: Real.arsinh_nonpos_iff
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LE.le (Real.arsinh x) 0) (LE.le x 0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_nonpos_iff : arsinh x ‚â§ 0 ‚Üî x ‚â§ 0 := by rw [‚Üê sinh_le_sinh, sinh_zero, sinh_arsinh]

name: Real.arsinh_pos_iff
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt 0 (Real.arsinh x)) (LT.lt 0 x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_pos_iff : 0 < arsinh x ‚Üî 0 < x :=
  lt_iff_lt_of_le_iff_le arsinh_nonpos_iff

name: Real.arsinh_neg_iff
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ Iff (LT.lt (Real.arsinh x) 0) (LT.lt x 0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem arsinh_neg_iff : arsinh x < 0 ‚Üî x < 0 :=
  lt_iff_lt_of_le_iff_le arsinh_nonneg_iff

name: Real.hasStrictDerivAt_arsinh
initialProofState:
x : Real
‚ä¢ HasStrictDerivAt Real.arsinh (Inv.inv (HAdd.hAdd 1 (HPow.hPow x 2)).sqrt) x
decl:
theorem hasStrictDerivAt_arsinh (x : ‚Ñù) : HasStrictDerivAt arsinh (‚àö(1 + x ^ 2))‚Åª¬π x := by
  convert sinhHomeomorph.toPartialHomeomorph.hasStrictDerivAt_symm (mem_univ x) (cosh_pos _).ne'
    (hasStrictDerivAt_sinh _) using 2
  exact (cosh_arsinh _).symm

name: Real.hasDerivAt_arsinh
initialProofState:

decl:

  (hasStrictDerivAt_arsinh x).hasDerivAt

name: Real.differentiable_arsinh
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Differentiable Real Real.arsinh
decl:
theorem differentiable_arsinh : Differentiable ‚Ñù arsinh := fun x =>
  (hasDerivAt_arsinh x).differentiableAt

name: Real.contDiff_arsinh
initialProofState:
n : ENat
‚ä¢ ContDiff Real (‚Üën) Real.arsinh
decl:
theorem contDiff_arsinh {n : ‚Ñï‚àû} : ContDiff ‚Ñù n arsinh :=
  sinhHomeomorph.contDiff_symm_deriv (fun x => (cosh_pos x).ne') hasDerivAt_sinh contDiff_sinh
